Posts.Content: Hi on Tuesday 26th June I got told I have invasive ductual cancer HER2 positive Grade 2. Next Wednesday I have an MRI and have to have a coil fitted in the tumour. While it’s a large lump I have told them I do not want chemo and I want a mastectomy I feeel strongly about this. I am getting more upset and stressed as I feel they are not listening to me and want to do the chemo. Surely it’s my choice at the end of the day. I am not scared of having a mastectomy I know this is the route I want to go and will deal with whatever afterÂ
Posts.Title: No chemo, no radiation breast cancer
